fullParallels.text: Yo pana bhikkhu jātarūparajataṁ uggaṇheyya vā uggaṇhāpeyya vā upanikkhittaṁ vā sādiyeyya, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhu Nissaggiya Pācittiya 18

translations.text: Welcher Mönch auch immer Gold oder Silber (Geld) nimmt, den Empfang veranlaßt oder hinterlegtes annimmt, muß es aushändigen und dafür sühnen.
If a monk takes, has someone else take, or consents to gold and silver being deposited for him, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
Si un bhikkhu acepta oro o plata [dinero], o hace aceptar, o consciente que se deposite [cerca de él]: ha de ser renunciado y confesado.

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。自手取金銀。若使人取。若教他取。尼薩耆波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Nissaggiya Pācittiya 18

fullParallels.text: 若比丘自手取金若使人取。尼薩耆波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Nissaggiya Pācittiya 18

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻自手捉金銀錢等。若教他捉。泥薩祇波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Nissaggiya Pācittiya 18

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。自捉金銀及錢。若使人捉若發心受。尼薩耆波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhu Nissaggiya Pācittiya 30

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。自手捉生色似色。若使人捉舉染著者。尼薩耆波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhu Nissaggiya Pācittiya 18

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘！自手捉錢、若金、銀。若教人捉，若置地受者，尼薩耆波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Nissaggiya Pācittiya 18

translations.text: If a monk take with his own hand either gold, silver, or even (copper) coin, or if he instruct another person to receive it for him, or if he keep on saying that there is such an one who may receive it, this is Nissaggiya Pācittiya.
Jika seorang bhikṣu secara pribadi menerima emas, perak, atau uang, menyuruh seseorang menerima itu untuknya, atau secara lisan menerima itu, ia melakukan sebuah naiḥsargika pāyattika.

fullParallels.text: 若比丘自手取金銀若錢。若教人取。若口可受者。尼薩耆波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Nissaggiya Pācittiya 18

fullParallels.text: Yā pana bhikkhunī jātarūparajataṁ uggaṇheyya vā uggaṇhāpeyya vā upanikkhittaṁ vā sādiyeyya, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya pācittiya 21

translations.text: Welche Nonne auch immer Gold oder Silber (Geld) nimmt, den Empfang veranlaßt oder hinterlegtes annimmt, muß es aushändigen und dafür sühnen.
Should any bhikkhuni take gold and silver, or have it taken, or consent to its being deposited (near her), it is to be forfeited and confessed.
Jika ada Bhikkhuni yang mengambil emas dan perak, atau telah mengambilnya, atau menyetujui untuk disimpan (di dekatnya), itu harus di sita dan di akui.

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘尼，自取金、銀、若錢，若教人取、若口可受，尼薩耆波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya Pācittiya 9

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼自捉金銀及錢。若使人捉若發心受。尼薩耆波逸提。
